JavaCool303

Class Cool303Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCool303.Cool303Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cool303Button, Cool303Container, Cool303Frame

    public abstract class Cool303Component
extends java.lang.Object
    The Cool303Component class serves as the framework for all concrete components (e.g., Cool303Button). It is a wrapper around AWT components, whereupon it applies the theme passed to it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Cool303Theme theme 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cool303Component(Cool303Theme theme)
      Constructor for a generic Cool303Component

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void applyTheme()
      The 'applyTheme' method applies this Cool303Component's Cool303Theme in an manner depending upon what the underlying Swing component is.
      protected abstract java.awt.Component getSwingComponent()
      For the Swing components that lie underneath to be handled for collection and displaying in containers and whatnot, the 'getSwingComponent' acts as a secure unwrapping.
      Cool303Theme getTheme()
      The 'getTheme' method returns a copy of the Cool303Theme associated with the object.
      protected void setTheme(Cool303Theme selectedTheme)
      The 'setTheme' method sets and applies the given theme for this Cool303Component.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
